changeSet.sql:
-- Creating Person Table. CREATE TABLE PERSON ( id numeric NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
-- Person Sequence CREATE SEQUENCE seq_person MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;

changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE BOOK ( id NUMERIC NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, author VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, publisher VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, isbn VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE, price NUMBER(10,2), PRIMARY KEY(id) );
CREATE SEQUENCE seq_book MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;

changeSet.author: rafael.ramos
rafael.ramos
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE permission ( id number(20) NOT NULL, description varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id) );
CREATE SEQUENCE seq_permission MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;

changeSet.author: rafael.ramos
rafael.ramos
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE users ( id number(20) NOT NULL, user_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, full_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, password varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, account_non_expired number(1) DEFAULT NULL, account_non_locked number(1) DEFAULT NULL, credentials_non_expired number(1) DEFAULT NULL, enabled number(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(id), CONSTRAINT uk_user_name UNIQUE (user_name) );
CREATE SEQUENCE seq_users MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9999999999 INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 1 CACHE 20;
